title: Game freezing without ping issues
body: On the last months I've been having some issues. First it was the black screen out of resulution error witch I couldn't see the loading screen befora game, and after trying everything the only thig that solved it was to change the game to boderless window. And now on the past week I cannot play without freezes from time to time. My ping is normal bit the game freezes and I can't move for 2-8 seconds and the actions animations sometimes occurs later. This game is messed up for real.. I execute the ping command on cmd and i don't have any package lost altough in the troubleshooting connections erros it says i have a major issue and some package losses during the game. I just don't know what to do in order to solve this. Think im just gonna stop playing this game.

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like you're experiencing some nasty bursts of *Packet Loss* in-game. This happens if there are issues between your PC and our servers that causes your packets of data to get lost along the way. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings aren't at fault for these symptoms.

Let me know if this helped.
